metadata.title: CVE-2021-27515 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low
metadata.description:
url-parse before 1.5.0 mishandles certain uses of backslash such as http:\/and interprets the URI as a relative path.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-27515` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-url-parse - 1.4.7-3ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-url-parse package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.4.7-3ubuntu0.1').
